CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: [Android] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email, you can reorder tools to customize your experience and make your most used actions even easier to reach.

OldVersion.description: Now while writing an email, you can reorder tools to customize your experience and make your most used actions even easier to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Understand and update sharing privileges on OneDrive and SharePoint links
CurrentVersion.description: Now, when you add a OneDrive or SharePoint file to an email, Outlook will notify you if anyone doesn't yet have permissions so you can update those before sending your email.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Understand and update sharing privileges on OneDrive and SharePoint links
OldVersion.description: Now, when you add a OneDrive or SharePoint file to an email, Outlook will notify you if anyone doesn't yet have permissions so you can update those before sending your email.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Support for Azure AD Single Sign-on (SSO) to HAADJ Cloud PCs
CurrentVersion.description: ,A user is able to leverage Azure AD Single Sign-on functionality to log into Windows 365 instance.

OldVersion.title: Windows 365: Support for Azure AD Single Sign-on (SSO) to HAADJ Cloud PCs
OldVersion.description: ,A user is able to leverage Azure AD Single Sign-on functionality to log into Windows 365 instance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Hide attendee names in Webinars (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can hide the names of attendees from other attendees during a webinar or a meeting, and only organizers and presenters are able to see the names of attendees.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Hide attendee names in Webinars (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Organizers can hide the names of attendees from other attendees during a webinar or a meeting, and only organizers and presenters are able to see the names of attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically view up to 9 videos (3x3) in Teams meetings in Chrome and Edge
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Teams Meetings currently supports a
maximum of 4 videos (2x2) on the screen by default (i.e., Gallery view) on web
browsers. With this update, users will be able to automatically see up to 9
videos (3x3) on Chrome and Edge on their screen by default without an explicit
action.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically view up to 9 videos (3x3) in Teams meetings in Chrome and Edge
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Teams Meetings currently supports a
maximum of 4 videos (2x2) on the screen by default (i.e., Gallery view) on web
browsers. With this update, users will be able to automatically see up to 9
videos (3x3) on Chrome and Edge on their screen by default without an explicit
action.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New SharePoint Start
CurrentVersion.description: New SharePoint start experience aims to inspire content creators to use their platform. By emphasizing a user-friendly approach that minimizes clicks, it's now easier to create websites, pages, news, and intranet content. Creators can return to the start experience hub to refine drafts, review past work, and monitor engagement metrics

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: New SharePoint Start
OldVersion.description: New SharePoint start experience aims to inspire content creators to use their platform. By emphasizing a user-friendly approach that minimizes clicks, it's now easier to create websites, pages, news, and intranet content. Creators can return to the start experience hub to refine drafts, review past work, and monitor engagement metrics

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: App user interface update
CurrentVersion.description: This update will change the Microsoft Whiteboard app user interface for laptops, desktops & tablets while simultaneously making whiteboarding tools upfront to improve engagement, discoverability, and ease of whiteboarding.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: App user interface update
OldVersion.description: This update will change the Microsoft Whiteboard app user interface for laptops, desktops & tablets while simultaneously making whiteboarding tools upfront to improve engagement, discoverability, and ease of whiteboarding.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Enhanced Controls for OKR and Initiatives Status
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Goals offers enhanced status control for OKRs and initiatives. Previously, when setting up an OKR or initiative, progress and status were combined into a single field. With this change, customers can now change status independently of progress, offering greater control and flexibility.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Enhanced Controls for OKR and Initiatives Status
OldVersion.description: Viva Goals offers enhanced status control for OKRs and initiatives. Previously, when setting up an OKR or initiative, progress and status were combined into a single field. With this change, customers can now change status independently of progress, offering greater control and flexibility.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-call user experience
CurrentVersion.description:
Making it easier for
users to access calling capabilities with a redesigned user experience during
calls.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-call user experience
OldVersion.description:
Making it easier for
users to access calling capabilities with a redesigned user experience during
calls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Empower end users to report inappropriate posts and comments in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Viva Engage users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning posts and comments within Viva Engage conversations. These reported posts are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for designated investigators with the appropriate role-based access control permissions to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Empower end users to report inappropriate posts and comments in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft Viva Engage users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning posts and comments within Viva Engage conversations. These reported posts are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for designated investigators with the appropriate role-based access control permissions to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-meeting Error Messaging
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft
Teams Meeting users will be notified directly through the error message for why
they cannot access meeting chats when their chat access is limited by policy or
due to system limitations and unexpected errors. This will only be available in
the new Teams experience.

Microsoft
Teams Meeting users will be notified directly through the error message for why
they cannot access meeting chats when their chat access is limited by policy or

the new Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
CurrentVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
OldVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Offline mode
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will allow you to launch OneDrive in your browser and view, sort, rename, move, copy, and delete files even without internet access. Additionally, for locally stored OneDrive files (those that are marked as “always available offline”) you will be able to open and work on these in your browser even if you are offline. All of the changes you make offline will be automatically synced back when Internet connection is restored.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Offline mode
OldVersion.description: ,This feature will allow you to launch OneDrive in your browser and view, sort, rename, move, copy, and delete files even without internet access. Additionally, for locally stored OneDrive files (those that are marked as “always available offline”) you will be able to open and work on these in your browser even if you are offline. All of the changes you make offline will be automatically synced back when Internet connection is restored.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New feedback experience
CurrentVersion.description:
The feedback entry point for Outlook for Web will be moving from the bottom of the Help pane to the Help tab of the ribbon, for ease of discovery. A streamlined experience, diagnostics log collection and the ability to add screenshots and video make it easier and quicker for users to describe their feedback and helps Microsoft act on it. Also, users can search for information related to their feedback, including updates on features under development, workarounds for problems and how-to from Help. This change obeys the general Feedback policy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/admin/manage/manage-feedback-ms-org?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New feedback experience
OldVersion.description:
The feedback entry point for Outlook for Web will be moving from the bottom of the Help pane to the Help tab of the ribbon, for ease of discovery. A streamlined experience, diagnostics log collection and the ability to add screenshots and video make it easier and quicker for users to describe their feedback and helps Microsoft act on it. Also, users can search for information related to their feedback, including updates on features under development, workarounds for problems and how-to from Help. This change obeys the general Feedback policy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/admin/manage/manage-feedback-ms-org?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: New user analytics extended to Microsoft Outlook, Teams, and Office
CurrentVersion.description:
User
analytics improvements that provide deeper insights and filtering capabilities
for search adoption across user segments like geography, department and
occupation as well as search applications such as SharePoint, Microsoft Search
for Bing, and Microsoft365.com. New capabilities include search insights from
within Windows Search, Outlook, Teams and other Microsoft Office applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: New user analytics extended to Microsoft Outlook, Teams, and Office
OldVersion.description:
User
analytics improvements that provide deeper insights and filtering capabilities
for search adoption across user segments like geography, department and
occupation as well as search applications such as SharePoint, Microsoft Search
for Bing, and Microsoft365.com. New capabilities include search insights from
within Windows Search, Outlook, Teams and other Microsoft Office applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
CurrentVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
OldVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex:  Microsoft Syntex is available in the non-primary region of multi-geo tenants
CurrentVersion.description: With this release, Syntex capabilities such as document processing, image tagging, taxonomy tagging, content assembly, and OCR are available in the non-primary region of multi-geo tenants.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex:  Microsoft Syntex is available in the non-primary region of multi-geo tenants
OldVersion.description: With this release, Syntex capabilities such as document processing, image tagging, taxonomy tagging, content assembly, and OCR are available in the non-primary region of multi-geo tenants.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exchange Auto-labeling supports non-mail enable security groups
CurrentVersion.description: Service side auto-labeling now supports scoping of exchange auto-labeling to non-mail enabled security groups.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exchange Auto-labeling supports non-mail enable security groups
OldVersion.description: Service side auto-labeling now supports scoping of exchange auto-labeling to non-mail enabled security groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Global exclusions
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, all exclusion features currently found under intelligent detections will be relocated to a new tab labeled "Global exclusions" within the insider risk settings. All previously added exclusions in intelligent detections will be migrated to this new tab.
The functionality of exclusions remains unchanged. Moreover, admins with appropriate permissions can now add exclusion via defined detection groups, which contain similar entities like domains or file types. This new tab is designed to enhance usability and offers a convenient way to access and manage exclusions.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Global exclusions
OldVersion.description:
,With this update, all exclusion features currently found under intelligent detections will be relocated to a new tab labeled "Global exclusions" within the insider risk settings. All previously added exclusions in intelligent detections will be migrated to this new tab.
The functionality of exclusions remains unchanged. Moreover, admins with appropriate permissions can now add exclusion via defined detection groups, which contain similar entities like domains or file types. This new tab is designed to enhance usability and offers a convenient way to access and manage exclusions.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
OldVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
Intelligent
recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily
browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access
AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Full File Evidence for all workloads in Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature grants the user the capability to view the source link of the file associated with the activity flagged in Activity Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Assign staff and set duration for on-demand Virtual Appointments (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
Scheduling
administrators and staff managing on-demand appointments can assign specific
staff members and set appointment duration to handle on-demand services. This
ensures that when an on-demand appointment is requested, there is a designated
staff member assigned to the appointment and a defined duration for the
appointment is set. The designated staff member also receives a notification to
attend the on-demand appointment.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Assign staff and set duration for on-demand Virtual Appointments (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
Scheduling
administrators and staff managing on-demand appointments can assign specific
staff members and set appointment duration to handle on-demand services. This
ensures that when an on-demand appointment is requested, there is a designated
staff member assigned to the appointment and a defined duration for the
appointment is set. The designated staff member also receives a notification to
attend the on-demand appointment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Auto-Remediation of Malicious Entity Clusters Identified in Automated Investigation and Response (AIR)
CurrentVersion.description: The feature will expand upon the automated investigation and response (AIR) by enabling AIR to automatically remediate malicious entity clusters. AIR currently recommends actions for SecOps to approve or decline and this enhancement will allow customers to enable auto-remediation to allow AIR to act on recommendations and soft delete messages included in a malicious URL or malicious file cluster.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Auto-Remediation of Malicious Entity Clusters Identified in Automated Investigation and Response (AIR)
OldVersion.description: The feature will expand upon the automated investigation and response (AIR) by enabling AIR to automatically remediate malicious entity clusters. AIR currently recommends actions for SecOps to approve or decline and this enhancement will allow customers to enable auto-remediation to allow AIR to act on recommendations and soft delete messages included in a malicious URL or malicious file cluster.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Meeting Option and Meeting Policy "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" is a new meeting option that gives meeting organizer the option to disable copying and sharing features on meeting chat messages for participants in order to reduce the risk of data leak. Once this restriction is enabled, meeting chat participants will not be able to copy chat messages using menu option or keyboard shortcut, forward messages or share messages to Outlook. There is also a new Meeting Policy setting in Teams admin center for admin to control whether user can see or use this feature in Meeting Options page. Admin can also set the default value for this meeting option in Meeting Templates they create.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Graph connector results merged inline in "All" vertical for GCC and GCCH
CurrentVersion.description: Results from external data sources that are ingested with Microsoft Graph connectors will be displayed in the "All" vertical alongside content from Microsoft 365 apps and services for GCC and GCC-High.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Graph connector results merged inline in "All" vertical for GCC and GCCH
OldVersion.description: Results from external data sources that are ingested with Microsoft Graph connectors will be displayed in the "All" vertical alongside content from Microsoft 365 apps and services for GCC and GCC-High.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall
OldVersion.description: ,Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.description: Simplified organization admin settings page and additional organization management controls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals--Goals Bulk Import Enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Improved bulk import of Goals experience and supporting additional fields with bulk import

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Updated post type designs in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: The design of the praise, poll, and question post types in Viva Engage are changing to a more streamlined format. Users will retain all the same publishing and engagement features as the previous design. We've made this change to put more emphasis on user content and help with the experience across surfaces.

Users will retain all the same publishing and engagement features as the previous design. We've made this change to put more emphasis on user content and help with the experience across surfaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enroll iOS devices into Azure AD Shared device mode
CurrentVersion.description: Shared device mode for iOS is an Azure Active Directory (AAD) capability supported by apps that allows you to initiate a global app sign in/ sign-out by any supported applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enroll iOS devices into Azure AD Shared device mode
OldVersion.description: Shared device mode for iOS is an Azure Active Directory (AAD) capability supported by apps that allows you to initiate a global app sign in/ sign-out by any supported applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) - Identify Teams as data sources
CurrentVersion.description: ,Simplified picking of relevant Teams and channels (standard, private, and shared) to intelligently identify associated custodian mailboxes, group mailboxes, OneDrive for Business accounts, and SharePoint sites that may contain Teams data that's relevant to your case. Note: We are updating a release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Note: We are updating a release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Forward
messages quickly from one chat to another using the right-click menu. You can
add additional content to the message to provide context and clarity for the
recipient. You can forward messages to 1:1 chats and group chats.

messages quickly from one chat to another using the right-click menu. You can

Creators can return to the start experience hub to refine drafts, review past work, and monitor engagement metrics

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: App user interface update
CurrentVersion.description: This update will change the Microsoft Whiteboard app user interface for laptops, desktops & tablets while simultaneously making whiteboarding tools upfront to improve engagement, discoverability, and ease of whiteboarding.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Enhanced Controls for OKR and Initiatives Status
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Goals offers enhanced status control for OKRs and initiatives. Previously, when setting up an OKR or initiative, progress and status were combined into a single field. With this change, customers can now change status independently of progress, offering greater control and flexibility.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updates to in-call user experience
CurrentVersion.description:
Making it easier for
users to access calling capabilities with a redesigned user experience during
calls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Empower end users to report inappropriate posts and comments in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Viva Engage users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning posts and comments within Viva Engage conversations. These reported posts are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for designated investigators with the appropriate role-based access control permissions to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Files app updated to OneDrive app experience in Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
The
Files app accessed from left side of the Teams desktop client will be updated
with the OneDrive app experience, bringing performance improvements, more
views, and the latest features of OneDrive to both classic and new Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Export APIs
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to export Viva Goals data via public APIs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Data Sources usability enhancements
CurrentVersion.description:
This batch of usability enhancements include
count of custodial locations in list page, improved hold status messaging in
list page, improved error details in the source flyout, downloadable error
report for custodian locations and ability to quickly retry holds.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Send a Viva Pulse request to a larger audience
CurrentVersion.description: Send pulses to up to 10,000 recipients.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Schedule a Viva Pulse request to be resent
CurrentVersion.description:
Schedule and resend pulses to get periodic
feedback from your team members.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse -Microsoft Teams Chat Notifications and Inline Response
CurrentVersion.description: Respond to a Viva Pulse request in Microsoft Teams chat in the flow of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
CurrentVersion.description: ,Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-meeting Error Messaging
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft
Teams Meeting users will be notified directly through the error message for why
they cannot access meeting chats when their chat access is limited by policy or
due to system limitations and unexpected errors. This will only be available in
the new Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
CurrentVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Offline mode
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature will allow you to launch OneDrive in your browser and view, sort, rename, move, copy, and delete files even without internet access. Additionally, for locally stored OneDrive files (those that are marked as “always available offline”) you will be able to open and work on these in your browser even if you are offline. All of the changes you make offline will be automatically synced back when Internet connection is restored.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New feedback experience
CurrentVersion.description:
The feedback entry point for Outlook for Web will be moving from the bottom of the Help pane to the Help tab of the ribbon, for ease of discovery. A streamlined experience, diagnostics log collection and the ability to add screenshots and video make it easier and quicker for users to describe their feedback and helps Microsoft act on it. Also, users can search for information related to their feedback, including updates on features under development, workarounds for problems and how-to from Help. This change obeys the general Feedback policy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/admin/manage/manage-feedback-ms-org?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Expand and Collapse Folders
CurrentVersion.description: Stay organized and navigate easily by expanding or collapsing your nested mail folders using the chevron button at the right of the folder row.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Expand and Collapse Folders
CurrentVersion.description: Stay organized and navigate easily by expanding or collapsing your nested mail folders using the chevron button at the right of the folder row.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Notifications for @mentions in mail and documents
CurrentVersion.description: Now you'll receive a notification when you're @mentioned in an email, document, or loop. To view your notifications, tap the bell icon to the upper right of the message list.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Notifications for @mentions in mail and documents
CurrentVersion.description: Now you'll receive a notification when you're @mentioned in an email, document, or loop. To view your notifications, tap the bell icon to the upper right of the message list.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New fields added to Activity Explorer.
CurrentVersion.description: Added Protection Event Type and Protection Type fields in Activity Explorer for sensitivity label applied, sensitivity labels updated, and sensitivity label removed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Justification text integration on web for Word, Excel, PowerPoint
CurrentVersion.description: ,Capturing justification text and showing this in Activity Explorer as a part of the label downgrade scenario.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Justification text integration on web for Word, Excel, PowerPoint
CurrentVersion.description: Capturing justification text and showing this in Activity Explorer as a part of the label downgrade scenario.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Content type for Teams meetings in Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,Adding Teams meeting content type to Activity Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Content type for Teams meetings in Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: Adding Teams meeting content type to Activity Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: New user analytics extended to Microsoft Outlook, Teams, and Office
CurrentVersion.description:
User
analytics improvements that provide deeper insights and filtering capabilities
for search adoption across user segments like geography, department and
occupation as well as search applications such as SharePoint, Microsoft Search
for Bing, and Microsoft365.com. New capabilities include search insights from
within Windows Search, Outlook, Teams and other Microsoft Office applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
CurrentVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex:  Microsoft Syntex is available in the non-primary region of multi-geo tenants
CurrentVersion.description: With this release, Syntex capabilities such as document processing, image tagging, taxonomy tagging, content assembly, and OCR are available in the non-primary region of multi-geo tenants.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exchange Auto-labeling supports non-mail enable security groups
CurrentVersion.description: Service side auto-labeling now supports scoping of exchange auto-labeling to non-mail enabled security groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Global exclusions
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, all exclusion features currently found under intelligent detections will be relocated to a new tab labeled "Global exclusions" within the insider risk settings. All previously added exclusions in intelligent detections will be migrated to this new tab.
The functionality of exclusions remains unchanged. Moreover, admins with appropriate permissions can now add exclusion via defined detection groups, which contain similar entities like domains or file types. This new tab is designed to enhance usability and offers a convenient way to access and manage exclusions.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
Intelligent
recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily
browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access
AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Full File Evidence for all workloads in Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature grants the user the capability to view the source link of the file associated with the activity flagged in Activity Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Assign staff and set duration for on-demand Virtual Appointments (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
Scheduling
administrators and staff managing on-demand appointments can assign specific
staff members and set appointment duration to handle on-demand services. This
ensures that when an on-demand appointment is requested, there is a designated
staff member assigned to the appointment and a defined duration for the
appointment is set. The designated staff member also receives a notification to
attend the on-demand appointment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Auto-Remediation of Malicious Entity Clusters Identified in Automated Investigation and Response (AIR)
CurrentVersion.description: The feature will expand upon the automated investigation and response (AIR) by enabling AIR to automatically remediate malicious entity clusters. AIR currently recommends actions for SecOps to approve or decline and this enhancement will allow customers to enable auto-remediation to allow AIR to act on recommendations and soft delete messages included in a malicious URL or malicious file cluster.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Meeting Option and Meeting Policy "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" is a new meeting option that gives meeting organizer the option to disable copying and sharing features on meeting chat messages for participants in order to reduce the risk of data leak. Once this restriction is enabled, meeting chat participants will not be able to copy chat messages using menu option or keyboard shortcut, forward messages or share messages to Outlook. There is also a new Meeting Policy setting in Teams admin center for admin to control whether user can see or use this feature in Meeting Options page. Admin can also set the default value for this meeting option in Meeting Templates they create.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Graph connector results merged inline in "All" vertical for GCC and GCCH
CurrentVersion.description: Results from external data sources that are ingested with Microsoft Graph connectors will be displayed in the "All" vertical alongside content from Microsoft 365 apps and services for GCC and GCC-High.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall
CurrentVersion.description: ,Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals--Improved organization admin settings experience
CurrentVersion.description: Simplified organization admin settings page and additional organization management controls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals--Goals Bulk Import Enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Improved bulk import of Goals experience and supporting additional fields with bulk import

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Updated post type designs in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: The design of the praise, poll, and question post types in Viva Engage are changing to a more streamlined format. Users will retain all the same publishing and engagement features as the previous design. We've made this change to put more emphasis on user content and help with the experience across surfaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enroll iOS devices into Azure AD Shared device mode
CurrentVersion.description: Shared device mode for iOS is an Azure Active Directory (AAD) capability supported by apps that allows you to initiate a global app sign in/ sign-out by any supported applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) - Identify Teams as data sources
CurrentVersion.description: ,Simplified picking of relevant Teams and channels (standard, private, and shared) to intelligently identify associated custodian mailboxes, group mailboxes, OneDrive for Business accounts, and SharePoint sites that may contain Teams data that's relevant to your case. Note: We are updating a release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward Messages in Teams chats
CurrentVersion.description:
Forward
messages quickly from one chat to another using the right-click menu. You can
add additional content to the message to provide context and clarity for the
recipient. You can forward messages to 1:1 chats and group chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Support for Azure AD Single Sign-on (SSO) to AADJ Cloud PCs
CurrentVersion.description: ,A user is able to leverage Azure AD Single Sign-on functionality to log into Windows 365 instance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join a meeting by digital code for GCC-High and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: User can join a meeting by entering a digital code.
